title: Tents & Tights
description: From USA Today bestselling author of Learning Curves comes a best friends to lovers, opposites attract romantic comedy with a curvy, outdoor-hating, boutique owner and an annoyingly attractive, outdoor-loving guy. Do opposites attract if they’re really, really opposite?Fed up with never finding clothes in her size, or worse—being sent to the maternity section—Eve decided enough was enough and started her plus-size boutique. Owning the shop somehow led to a friendship with the well-known owner of the famous outdoor adventure store in town.They were complete opposites in every way, but it worked. And he was by far the best friend she’d ever had.Four years ago Austin walked into Own Your Curves to ask about plus-size outdoor clothes for his shop, and the next thing he knew, he was best friends with the feisty, always-kept-him-on-his-toes, pain-in-his-backside owner, Eve.So when she asked for his guidance expanding her shop with plus-size undergarments, how could he tell her no?One problem, though. As Austin helped Eve with the expansion, he couldn’t stop his imagination from blurring the line between friendship and something more.
author: Molly O'Hare
